verses.name: Mark 13:5
verses.text: And Jesus answering them began to say, Take heed lest any man deceive you:

verses.name: Mark 13:6
verses.text: For many shall come in my name, saying, I am Christ; and shall deceive many.

verses.name: Mark 13:7
verses.text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars, be ye not troubled: for such things must needs be; but the end shall not be yet.

verses.name: Mark 13:8
verses.text: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
